data.comment: Jarred Gillett starts the match. Stoke with the kick-off in Stoke.
Goal! Carel Eiting gives Huddersfield a 0-1 lead in Stoke.
In the minute 31, Goal! Tyrese Campbell levels the match at 1-1.
Stoke take a 2-1 lead thanks to Tyrese Campbell.
Goal! The away team draw level at 2-2 through Isaac Mbenza.
In the minute 44, John Mikel Obi (Stoke) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Richard Stearman scores an unfortunate own goal. This makes it 3-2 at bet365 Stadium.
Huddersfield's Jonathan Hogg has been booked in Stoke.
The second-half has commenced. Huddersfield with the kick-off.
It's now 4-2 in Stoke as Sam Clucas scores for Stoke.
In the minute 59, The away team have replaced Josh Koroma with Danny Ward. This is the first substitution made today by Carlos Corberan.
Carlos Corberan (Huddersfield) is making a second substitution, with Juninho Bacuna replacing Demeaco Duhaney.
Naby Sarr (Huddersfield) strikes with a header to reduce the deficit to 4-3 at bet365 Stadium.
In the minute 62, Tommy Smith (Stoke) has received a yellow card from Jarred Gillett.
Nathan Collins is replacing Jacob Brown for Stoke at bet365 Stadium.
Michael O'Neill is making the team's second substitution at bet365 Stadium with Jordan Cousins replacing Steven Fletcher.
In the minute 85, The home team replace Tyrese Campbell with Sam Vokes.
Michael O'Neill is making the team's fourth substitution at bet365 Stadium with Lee Gregory replacing Nick Powell.
Adama Diakhaby is replacing Isaac Mbenza for the away team.
In the minute 87, Carlos Corberan (Huddersfield) is making a fourth substitution, with Matty Daly replacing Jonathan Hogg.
The match is over. Final score 4-3.
